name: BizTalkApplicationDeploy
description: Create or Update the BizTalk Server Application
author: Microsoft BizTalk Server

inputs.name: operationName
inputs.label: Operation name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Actions to be performed on the BizTalk Application deployment.

options.UpdateApplication: Update an existing BizTalk Server Application

inputs.name: applicationName
inputs.label: Application name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of BizTalk Application to be installed.

inputs.name: packagePath
inputs.label: Deployment package path
inputs.visibleRule: operationName = CreateApplication || operationName = UpdateApplication || operationName = InstallApplication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path of BizTalk Application package in zip format. Mandatory for Create and Update operations.

inputs.name: applicationStart
inputs.label: Start application
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option if you want to start the application after the deployment is complete.

inputs.name: referencedApplicationStop
inputs.label: Stop referenced application(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option if you want to stop applications that refer to this application.

inputs.name: applicationReferences
inputs.label: Add application references
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the comma-separated list of referenced applications.
